CustomField.description:
Date in which this phone number was last deemed to be in an active campaign and thus requiring a DNC status.
Essentially it is the timestamp for when a Batch or Manual Wash pushed this phone number into the DNC Wash Register.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Date in which this phone number was last deemed to be in an active campaign and thus requiring a DNC status.
CustomField.label: Qualification Date
